PHRASE.LANG: A soft colour is a comfy colour, and this couch really is as comfortable as it looks. [#Legal]
Une couleur douce est une couleur confortable, et ce canapé est vraiment aussi confortable qu'il y paraît. [#Legal]
Eine weiche Farbe strahlt Gemütlichkeit aus, und diese Couch ist wirklich so gemütlich, wie sie aussieht. [#Legal]
Un soffice colore è un colore comodo, e questo divano è davvero così comodo come sembra. [#Legal]
Un color suave es un color confortable, y este sofá es tan confortable como parece. [#Legal]
A soft color is a comfy color, and this couch really is as comfortable as it looks. [#Legal]
부드러운 색은 편안한 색이죠, 그리고 이 소파는 정말로 보기만큼이나 편안해요. [#Legal]
A soft color is a comfy color, and this couch really is as comfortable as it looks. [#Legal]
柔和的顏色給人舒適的感覺，而這張長沙發亦如其外表般舒適。 [#Legal]
柔和的顏色給人舒適的感覺，而這張長沙發亦如其外表般舒適。 [#Legal]
A soft color is a comfy color, and this couch really is as comfortable as it looks. [#Legal]
